In England, in the seven days to 10 June, there were 39,321 new confirmed cases (69.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 June, there were 24,971 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 57% (14,350 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 June is 3,994,408 (7,096.5 cases per 100,000 population).
